use my tablet. It has done everything needed so really happy with it so far.

Seems to do everything I can do in WhatsApp except make phone calls great 
app!
Excellent app. Does exactly what I need

Easy to use. No problems so far. Great that I can use the larger keyboard 
on my tablet.
I use mainly Telegramm

Love the interactivity and presentation and easy communication with

The issue is if the cell is not near or turned on one does not have access. 
One must access the cell and scan the QR code again for access via one's 
tablet and computer. In my opinion, once I have scanned the code I should 
not need to do so unless my cell has been reported lost or stolen. There 
...Full ReviewThe issue is if the cell is not near or turned on one does not have access. 
One must access the cell and scan the QR code again for access via one's 
tablet and computer. In my opinion, once I have scanned the code I should 
not need to do so unless my cell has been reported lost or stolen. There 
have been times I have left my cell at home but I have my tablet in hand. 
It would be nice if I could maintain my connection through this app without 
needing my cell to be close by and turned on. Thank you for your time and 
consideration.

Needed WhatsApp on my tablet as well as my smart phone, but everytime I 
tried to download it, I would get a "your device is not compatible with 
this version" message from Whatsapp.This app (Tablet Messenger) FINALLY 
gave me a solution! And it was very easy to use.

So far, so good. Although Google says that the App may not be optimized for 
my device, it installed and the QR Code scan worked without any problem. I 
can see all my WhatsApp contacts, so now I hope it works as advertised.

Whatsapp was working good all time with my tablet sammsung Tab A 8 but 
after I made the last update, it stop working in tablet,I unistall the apps 
two or three times, but ,now is not working at all....Sorry.... I 
reinstslled again and now is working wonderfull...thank you

Just few minutes a I've been trying to correct my chats mistakes! But I 
couldn't able to correct it! Then I've tried to delete that chat! I've 
clicked on delete chat with friend and your bloody chat messenger deleted 
my friends all new pictures + chats + old pictures and chats and everything 
it'...Full ReviewJust few minutes a I've been trying to correct my chats mistakes! But I 
couldn't able to correct it! Then I've tried to delete that chat! I've 
clicked on delete chat with friend and your bloody chat messenger deleted 
my friends all new pictures + chats + old pictures and chats and everything 
it's from my mobile!!!??? Now I'm Crying!!!??? Now, I'm really really very 
disappointed about this bloody messenger behaviour or you people's are 
responsible on this!!!??? I'm totally shocked on what I've been through and 
don't know what to do or how to get it back!!!???.......

Very good app for group chats. Only problem with using on tablet is it 
sometimes freezes and can't find mobile so have to rescan barcode
Sooooo disappointed!!! My TabE can not make any type calls with this!

Since there's no official WhatsApp app that I can use for my Android 
tablet, this simple web interface app with a few nice tweaks works 
perfectly! Thanks!

I ,love having WhatsApp on the big screen of my tablet. And all this works 
without a SIM card and data tariff. Just using Wi-Fi and mirroring my 
phones WhatsApp to here. Very helpful.

Found an app that works on tablet as well as phone. Although says not 
optimized for my device have not had any issues with it. Easy to set up 
with QR code

It's great! The whole family uses it to stay in touch and we are spread out 
from Georgia to Brazil to Washington state.

Nice app overall, I have android phone and android tablet, they are both 
from different manufacturers. One improvement is the able to make video 
calls like I have with WhatsAp on my phone. Viber can do this, but overall 
I prefer this Ap

Allows me to connect my Samsung tablet to my WhatsApp account on my Samsung 
Galaxy 8. Very used friendly. Only negative is I have not found a way to 
record a video message, but can do a voice message.

whats to say - its a whatsap client. mostly works as i guess was intended 
but occasionally loses connection to my phone (samsung s5 running lineage

The official WhatsApp application won't work on my tablet, but this app 
does the job. I only use it for texting so can't speak to other features.
